Welcome to An Inquiring Mind.

My name is Jamison and I have an innate curiosity towards most things in life. My professional aspirations lie in software development and I enjoy teaching others as my own expertise grows. This educational style is exemplified by my Project Showcase. Of all my pursuits, I find Music and Travel to be the most rewarding. The About Me page delves more into who I am, but in a nutshell, if I had to be anywhere in the world I'd be here:
